title: Escalators :- Escalators may be permitted in addition to required lifts
clause_text: Escalators :- Escalators may be permitted in addition to required lifts. Such escalators may also be permitted in atrium area of the buildings.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Escalators :- Escalators may be permitted in addition to required lifts. Such escalators may also be permitted in atrium area of the buildings.
